Getting the idea - atomic physics

Early atomic physics - the development of the first ideas. The first ideas started with Democritus atom is unsplittable. Then John Dalton Law of constant proportions. Avogadro Molecular theory of gas laws. Prout's hydrogen weight hypothesis. Dmitri Mendeleev development of the periodic table.
